.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Immatures:
Bahillo & Coello 1999
: 64 .

Distribution within Iran .
See under subspecies
orientalis
.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Cyphosoma lawsoniae orientalis
Bílý 1983 a
: 55
(subspecies of
lawsoniae
); Kubáň 2006 : 347 ;
Bellamy 2008 b
: 963
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution outside Iran .
None recorded.

synonym: sibiricum (
Fabricius) 1781
: 279 (
Buprestis
).

synonym: repandum (
Ménétriés) 1832
: 150 (
Buprestis
).

Host plant(s) within Iran .
(Adult) Tamarisk (
Tamarix
, Tamaricaceae ) (
Farahbakhsh 1960
;
Abai & Adeli 1984
, sapwood), Oak (
Quercus
spp., Fagaceae ) (
Modarres Awal 1997
).

Note. Description of the larva in
Richter ( 1952 )
belongs to unknown buprestid species, possibly
Capnodis
. Record for
Quercus
as a host plant (
Modarres Awal 1997
) is extremely doubtful, known larvae of
Cyphosoma
develop inside the root tubers of Cyperaceae (
Bahillo & Coello 1999
;
Volkovitsh & Korotyaev 2007
).

sp.,

sp., barley, date palm, wheat (

;
Modarres Awal 1997
).
